title: France panorama. [No. 71/31]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The passing scene: “Mediterranean Art” - re-opening of the antique arts rooms at the Louvre; “The Windmills of Paris” - motionless sails of a recent past. 2. Electricity and measurements - ONERA metrology. 3. Baccarat - the Lorraine village of Bacccarat is known especially for its crystal-ware of the same name. 4. Art Crafts House - the Paris Art Crafts House, on the fringe of the Latin Quarter, on the left Bank.
